content: I'm having an error and I can't figure out what is happening

 [java] Picked up JAVA_TOOL_OPTIONS: -Dfile.encoding=UTF-8

Found it.
For those that have the same issue, the solution is to refresh the Packages folder. C:\Users\xxxx\.fhir\packages
